title: SML_SetOpmode (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SML_SetOpmode
Sets the mode of operation to a new value, if necessary.
If
eSetOpmode
<>
eOpmode
or
eActOpmode
<>
eOpmode
, the value of the
parameter
eSetOpMode
(2000) is written to
eOpmode
.
The operation succeeds once parameter
eActOpMode
(2001) has the new value.

rows.Name: bBusy
rows.Comment: The FB is not finished and new output values are to be expected

rows: The mode of operation has been successfully set
